about.title: About me
about.part1: Hi! I am Ana Carolina, a front-end developer specializing in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I am continuously enhancing my skills with modern frameworks like React.
about.part2: Though I am just starting my professional journey, I have built several personal projects, including responsive single-page apps and landing pages. These projects have sharpened my problem-solving abilities and taught me how to turn design concepts into functional and engaging user experiences.
about.part3: I love learning new technologies and aim to create applications with clean code that are efficient, accessible, and meet user expectations. I look forward to bringing my enthusiasm and dedication to a team!

projects.title: Projects
projects.desc: Turning designs into stunning, responsive, accessible, and animated web pages.

project1.title: Space Tourism - SPA
project1.desc: This web app is a fully responsive single-page application (SPA) built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, based on a design provided by Frontend Mentor, showcasing a clean and intuitive user interface. The app features four pages—Home, Destinations, Crew, and Technology—each designed to immerse users in the excitement of space exploration. It includes smooth navigation, keyboard-accessible tabs, and engaging animations to enhance usability and interactivity.

project2.title: EasyBank Landing Page
project2.desc: This project involved creating a landing page for the digital bank Easybank, based on a design provided by Frontend Mentor. The main focus was on layout fidelity and implementing animations to enhance user interaction. I developed the application using React, with modular styling through Styled Components and animations powered by Framer Motion for a smoother and more interactive visual experience.

project3.title: Where in the World? - SPA
project3.desc: Responsive single-page application (SPA) that integrates the REST Countries API, allowing users to view all countries on the home page, search for a specific country using an accessible search component, and filter countries by region. Users also can click on a country to access a detailed information page. Additionally, the app features a persisted light/dark theme toggle, providing a personalized and seamless user experience.
